package.description: This node implements Dr. Daniel Mellinger's RAM 2010 paper with the additional integral term. The integral term compensates for the unmodelled robot parameters such as mass, inertia and propeller characteristics. This node listens for current and next states and generates TRPY (and some more parameters) to be fed to asctec/khex low level driver.
